comments.body:
I'm seeing the same error. In my case, I had deleted my saved variables file because I was seeing a lot of other errors from TellMeWhen, probably because I had a corrupted set somehow.

The problem seems to be that when TMW creates an initial set of saved variables, it misses out a field which is required for support of LibButtonFacade. It looks like upgrading from a previous version takes care of this, it's just for initial installs or (in my case) fresh defaults that are a problem.

One workround might be to just disable or uninstall ButtonFacade; I haven't tried that, though. The workround I'm trying myself is to add the following as line 91 of the main TellMeWhen.lua:

``` LBF = {}, ```

Making something like this:

``` Point = {}, LBF = {}, }; ```

If you now remove TellMeWhen's saved variable file for your character and restart WoW, it will create new defaults that are OK if you're running ButtonFacade. Obviously that wouldn't be something you'd want to do if you had already set up some groups...

I don't know if this is all that's required to fix this issue, but it lets me log in without the error at least.


> Posted by CurseForge user alerre

Sorry, When I added button facade settings per group I forgot to add a blank entry to the defaults. Thanks Alerre!
